name: Anime Paint - Color By Number
description:
\\ A Brand New Anime Color By Number Game! //

Do you want to release stress?
Are you looking for a new way to relax or already a coloring enthusiast?
Anime Paint is your best choice!

Anime Paint upgrades the traditional coloring book app to bring a more modern work for both kids and adults. It provides the most relaxing and simplest way to release your stresses, increase your creativity in painting!

Various editors’ selected images and pictures are collected for you coloring and more coloring pages update every day!

Anime Paint. Anytime. Anywhere.
__________________________

FEATURES

- Enjoy the uplifting and unique coloring experience that drive your stress away!
- Rich anime themes and categories of pictures/paintings!
- Switch among the unlimited and helpful tools!
- Advance your coloring skill and imagination from easy to difficult pictures!
- Get new images and pictures every day!
- Build your own collections with the colorful treasures!
- Dive into the customized coloring feeds that special for you!
- Replay the time-lapse video and review how the world changes under your magical fingers!
- Try new ideas and inspirations! Recolor the completed artworks whenever you want!
- Totally offline support, no wifi needed! Color it anytime, anywhere!
- Completely FREE coloring book!
__________________________

We always feel stressed out in daily life, here we offer you a free coloring book to relax yourself. In the game, you will enjoy the coolest experience of coloring, painting and creating arts! And make the world become colorful and alive under your fingers!

Get this chance to show your color of the world through your own artworks! Share your attitude of life and let people see how different and beautiful the world is in your eyes!

Anime Paint Premium
